answers.answer: Whenever I have my boyfriend feel the baby move he tells me "that's weird!" But he's always thought he idea of a person growing and living in my stomach a weird concept.

A woman asked me if I was starving myself.At a checkup, a woman got mad because I went back before she did and asked if it was because I was having a government baby. The nurse quickly informed her that I saw a completely different doctor. I also snapped that I wasnt having a government baby.Yesterday, while I was walking to the nurse after she called my name, another lady whispered how I was another teenage unwed mom. I was contracting and not feeling well so I turned around and asked her in front of the busy lobby if she would like to see my drivers license and my wedding band I got 5 years ago. She looked down in humiliation real quick. I'm 27 years old, not 14! Not my fault the Lord made me 4' 10"
I had whirl walking behind me call me fat. I was 7 months pregnant at the time. I turned around and informed her I was growing a child and asked her what her excuse was.
*a girl*
Gotta love strangers commenting on your life. I had strange women telling me if I had an epidural I wasn't a real woman. Idk why being pregnant people get the right to comment on your life.

^^^ oh wow how rude ppl can be. I hate when ppl tell me how small i am or omg ur pregnant, ur so tiny, a lot of different comments like that, i always feel like tellin them im exactly were in supposed to be, i measure out perfect size measurements and all, :)

my major issue with insensitivity isn't a comment or question but an action. my husband and i have told my mother in law that we are avoiding alcohol 100%, including baking and cooking. she invited us over for dinner and after i found out she had been using wine to make gravy.i know its not the end of the world for the baby. but its the fact that we have told her I don't want to consume any at all and then for her to sneak it into my food like that. i just feel so disrespected. and how do you go over for dinner next time? 1. i know now she doesn't respect my wishes and 2. how do i eat without always asking what is in it.just disappointed.
My MIL told me I couldn't name my son an Italian name because his last name will be Irish but my Fiancés mixed with Italian.

My sisters husband kept asking was I sure there was only one in there cos I look so huge!! I was a size 8 before I got pregnant and I'm only 5ft4 so of course I'm gona look bigger, I have a 26week old growing baby in my tummy. people seem to think its ok to comment on weight just cos ur pregnant. well its just bloody rude grrr lol!

My doctor told me because I'm plus sized that I'm going to have an overweight child. I was so hurt! She also told me since I'm overweight that I was DEFINITELY going to get preeclampsia and gestational diabetes, like she knew for certain that I was going to get them at 8 weeks! Needless to say, I have an appointment with a new doctor on friday.

im the same way as the other tasha. everyone who comments on me is like omg ur so tiny and r u eating right and all that crap i hate it. i eat all the time and ive gained 15 pounds but its all in my stomach and u cant even tell. but luckily im gettin a visible bump! :)
"Wow you look really full"..
Im 4 days until my due date I get the " look at your belly you're huge!" I just love hearing that.

While trying to decide on a name for our son my boyfriends mother jumped in telling me that she didn't like any of the names informed her that she wasn't part of the convo since I wanted my boyfriend to have the only say in the name so she told us that if we named our son a name she didn't like she would choose her own name for him and call him whatever she liked so my oldest stepson tried to join in the convo and was trying to suggest some names and she jumped in again telling him to shut up that he had no say in anything with the baby. also I have a problem with her calling us yelling at us cause I didn't invite her to any of my dr appointments or taken her with us to go baby shopping. When at that point I hadn't even started shopping for baby stuff. Also I hate it when everyone tells me what day to have the baby on or what day not to like I have any control over when I go into labor I hate hearing (if you go into labor on or around my birthday I am going to be so mad at you)

So my MIL insists on telling me how "fat" i am whenever she sees me. Funny thing is im 4 days over due and i actually lost weight so im 6 lbs UNDER my pre-pregnancy weight. Ugh. People are so rude and thoughtless sometimes.

I had someone ask me if I was preg or if I was just getting chubby...People are rude and dont know when to keep their mouths closed!  i would NEVER comment on another woman unless you could planly without a doubt tell she was preg!
Well yesterday at work a co-worker of mines told me that I shouldn't use my pregnancy as an excuse just because I was sick & nauseated
Well sumtimes this boy at school calls my belly the world but it never gets to me becus I kno my pregnancy is a gift from god , n I love my baby n he's still n the belly bump .

I've had a few comments I managed to just shrug off, but the one comment that really got to me was 'oh look another young mam scrounging off benefits '!! Gave her a right ear full.. Er im 23yrs old and never got a penny off the government my partner of many years have worked his butt off every day to pay our rent, council tax, bills etc so get ur facts right before u start judging.. Argh makes me so mad! !
Well yesterday at work a co-worker of mines told me that I shouldn't use my pregnancy as an excuse just because I was sick & nauseated, I laid her *** out so she won't step to me like that again

question: Being pregnant I find there are some insensitive people in the world. I just want to know what comments have you gotten from people while you were pregnant. My fiancés friend told me the thought of a baby moving in my belly he thought was weird. what insensitive comments or questions have you gotten?
title: pregnancy comments
